key.name: notify-on-useronlinestatuschange
key.summary: Notify On User Online Status Change
key.description: Whether or not to use Desktop Notifications when someone goes online and offline

key.name: notify-on-messagerecieve
key.description: Whether or not to use Desktop Notifications when you receive a message

key.name: notify-on-initializing
key.description: Whether or not to use Desktop Notifications during startup of all online users

key.name: display-indicator-avatars
key.description: Whether or not to display avatars next to the indicators

key.name: display-notification-avatars
key.description: Whether or not to display avatars in the Desktop Notification

key.name: notify-on-incoming-filetransfer
key.description: Whether or not to use Desktop Notifications when you receive a file transfers

key.name: notify-on-outgoing-filetransfer
key.description: Whether or not to use Desktop Notifications when you send a file transfers

key.name: show-outgoing-file-progress
key.description: Whether or not to show the outgoing filetransfer progress in the unity launcher

key.name: show-incoming-file-progress
key.description: Whether or not to show the incoming filetransfer progress in the unity launcher

key.name: start-skype-cmd-params
key.summary: Set parameters to provide skype with in the commandline (only used if skype isn't running yet)

key.name: list-of-silence
key.description: Disable notifications from certain users. Note that you need to supply the users username. (e.g ['sagetarian', 'bob'])

key.name: debug-log
key.description: Writes all events to a log file in ~/.skype-wrapper/log.txt

key.name: debug-level
key.description: Requires Restart. How much debug information you want. Lower numbers display the higher ones. i.e "info" debugging hides "verbose" messages but outputs "warning"s and "error"s (0 = Verbose, 1 = Info, 2 = Warning, 3 = Errors)

key.name: cpu-percentage-limit
key.description: Requires Restart. This is the CPU limiter for indicator-skype to ensure that it doesn't consume too much CPU time. Increase this if the performance is bad

key.name: use-global-status
key.description: Set Skype status from Messaging Menu (true) or independently (false).

key.name: control-music-player
key.description: Pauses playback when starting a call and resumes it after the call ended.

key.name: restore-volume
key.description: Restore the volume to the level prior the call.
